description: The Blue Hills Ski Area Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, open Blue Hills Ski Area
Alexa, ask Blue Hills Ski Area for the snow report
Alexa, ask Blue Hills Ski Area for latest conditions
imageAltText: Snow Report for Blue Hills Ski Area icon
name: Snow Report for Blue Hills Ski Area
shortDescription: The Blue Hills Ski Area Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Blue Hills Ski Area.
